pages.text: $(#630000)The Lithograph is a special device that can process Remnants dropped by Enhanced Mobs into Chip Fragments, a crafting material.$(br)It holds slots for 5 Remnants, with the caveat that each of those must come from a different mob.

$(#630000)For instance, the Lithograph cannot process two Zombie Remnants, but a Zombie and Husk remnant can be inserted together. Once 5 unique Remnants have been inserted, it will slowly produce a Chip Fragment.$(br)Items are inserted via right click, and doing so with an empty hand will remove one.
A Lithograph with 5 remnants inside. It is crafting a Chip Fragment.
